text:
="preserve">A duvet is a type of bedding used as a blanket, on a bed. They are normally made of a cover, filled with feathers or man-made fibres such as polyester and hollow fibre. They are soft and comfortable, and keep the user warm at night.
Togs.
The thickness of the duvet is measured by a tog rating. The higher the tog, the warmer the duvet will be. The warmest duvet would be a 13.5 tog.
All Season Duvets.
There is an all season duvet where you get two duvets with different togs, usually a 4.5 and a 9.5.
